charinfo.name: Zetsu (S)
charinfo.description: Zetsu (S) is intent to follow Tobi's orders. With his abilities he will be trouble for anyone that comes across him.

abilities.name: Spore Technique
abilities.description: Zetsu (S) uses Spore Technique on one teammate or himself. For 2 turns the target of this skill will gain 1 random chakra and ignore drain effects.

abilities.name: Wood Release Roots
abilities.description: Zetsu (S) attacks from below using Wood Release Roots on one enemy dealing 30 piercing damage. That enemy's  physical and chakra skills will be stunned for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability.

abilities.name: Parasite Clone
abilities.description: Zetsu (S) targets one enemy. If that enemy uses a new skill Zetsu (S) will copy it for 4 turns. Unique skills cannot be copied. This skill is invisible.

abilities.name: Zetsu Substitute
abilities.description: This skill makes Zetsu (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
